sentences.en: Berenice had been an impressionable child.
sentences.cn: 白丽莱茜本是个敏感的孩子.
处于易受外界影响的年龄的儿童
孩子们都非常敏感的头脑.

sentences.en: Enthusiasm: Children are impressionable and look to adults for guidance.
sentences.cn: 热忱: 孩子,易受影响,需大人指引.

sentences.en: He is in a highly impressionable state.
sentences.cn: 他正处于极易受影响的状态.

sentences.en: He might be an impressionable youngster.
sentences.cn: 他有可能是个容易受影响的年轻人.

sentences.en: I believe that perhaps I was much influenced by such books, read at an impressionable age.
sentences.cn: 我认为这些书大概对我影响很大, 因为是在容易接受的年龄里读的.

sentences.en: The child is at an impressionable age.
sentences.cn: 这孩子正处于易受影响的年龄.

sentences.en: The kids are at an impressionable age.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子正处在易受影响的年龄.

sentences.en: The law is intended to protect young and impressionable viewers.
sentences.cn: 该法律意图保护那些年轻且无判断力的电视观众。

sentences.en: The Za don't say she is more impressionable topic all right?
sentences.cn: 不说她更易感的主题还好 吧 ?

sentences.en: Then there is spring, the season for simpering adolescents , May flies and impressionable poetasters.
sentences.cn: 再说春天吧.那是乐呵呵的小青年, 多愁善感的三流诗人和蜉蝣的季节.

sentences.en: You are impressionable like the Emperor.
sentences.cn: 你和皇上一样耳软心活.

sentences.en: You are more sensitive, impressionable, dreamy, or idealistic at this time also.
sentences.cn: 你在这个时候还会更加敏感, 易受影响, 爱做梦, 或是理想主义.

words.tran_cn: 敏感的；感受性强烈的；易感动的
感人的；令人钦佩的；给人以深刻印象的
印象；效果，影响；压痕，印记；感想

trans.tran_en: someone who is impressionable is easily influenced, especially because they are young
